messages.subject: Re: Ren & Elissa
messages.msgSnippet: ... so she s ... message boards ... Thanks! I m actually going to be camping ( in cabins)with Elissa starting tomorrow. It is an unschoolers camp in Frederick
messages.messageBody:
--- In AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com, kbcdlovejo@a... wrote:
>
> Elissa recently moved. She's only able to be online a limited time,
so she's
> not checking in here (HOURS of reading a week!). She checks the
message boards
> regularly though.
>
> Ren's compuer is dead. Getting a new one soon.
>
> Both will be at the conference.
>
> ~Kelly
>

Thanks!
I'm actually going to be camping ( in cabins)with Elissa starting
tomorrow.
It is an unschoolers camp in Frederick MD. I think about 15 families
are coming this time.
A group there started it a few years ago. I met the organizer on the
beach on Assateague last summer and we became friends and she invited
me to come last fall. I live about 4 hours away. We had a blast!
I was informed Elissa and a few families from her area will be coming
this time and I'm am excited to meet her.
It's Sun. thru Thurs.
I unfortunately have to travel to find like minded souls, but it's
well worth it.


Joanna

messages.subject: Ren & Elissa
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/24/2003 10:45:13 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Elissa recently moved. She s only able to be online a limited time, so she s not checking
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/24/2003 10:45:13 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
Wilkinson6@... writes:
> How come Elissa is off the list?
> Also, where did Ren go?
>
> Joanna (the curious)
>

Elissa recently moved. She's only able to be online a limited time, so she's
not checking in here (HOURS of reading a week!). She checks the message boards
regularly though.

Ren's compuer is dead. Getting a new one soon.

Both will be at the conference.

~Kelly
